results.name: Denominators of coefficients in expansion of 1/(1 - sin x).
comment: The numerators are the same as for sec(x) + tan(x); see A099612.
link: Clark Kimberling, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
mathematica: z = 30; t = CoefficientList[Series[1/(1 - Sin[x]), {x, 0, z}], x];
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_, Dec 07 2016
